full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DGRA LHA'I BSKANG GSO DKAR PO RGYAL PO BYED ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @009A *, ,(CES DGRA LHA'I BSKANG GSO DKAR PO RGYAL BYED ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI RANG GIS MCHED GROGS RDO RJE ZHES BYA BAS 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES BSKUL BA'I NGOR SNGA MO NAS YOD PAS YIG CHAD BSKANG GSO MA MTHONG BAS, ,GU RU'I GTOR MA DGRA LHA'I DPANG BSTOD ZHES BYA BA NAS BKOD PA 'DI NI SNGAGS 'CHANG SMON LAM LHUN GRUB KYIS SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI RIGS NAS AA RIG CES SOGS DU MA LA MKHAS PAS RNAM DPYOD CAN BLO BZANG DBANG PHYUG 'DI KYANG 'GRO RNAMS DGE ZHING BDE BAR 'GYUR CIG , ,,GTOR MA'I YO BYAD RNAMS BSHAMS TSUL NI, DANG PO GZHI MA DKAR PO GTZANG MA RGYA CHE'I STENG DU, ,SHA DMAR MAR KHRAG DANG BSRES PA'I ZAN GYI ZLUM GTOR MA CHEB GCIG MTHA' BSKOR DU GTOR TSUNG ZLUM PO BRGYAD, ,MDUN DU GTOR MA ZUR GSUM GCIG LHAG RNAMS 'THEB DKYU DANG BCAS DE NAS MCHOD PA SNA LNGA DKAR GSUM MNGAR GSUM SHA KHRAG 'BRU SNA SMAN SNA RIN CHEN LNGA THOG BU RAM SPRANG RTZE 'BRAS ZAN DANG BCAS, ,KHRAB RMOG MDA' GZHU RAL GRI MI MDA' MDUNG PHUB DAR TSON SNA LNGA'I MDA' BCAS PA DANG, ,'DOD YON LNGA @009B DANG RGYAL SRID SNA BDUN BKRA SHIS RTAGS BRGYAD RTA PHUB DUNG RKANG GLING ROL MO SNA TSOGS DANG, GZHAN YANG RA GA-YAG RNGA MONG RA LUG SOGS SPYAN GZIGS GANG 'BYOR BA DANG GONG GIS GZHI MA DKAR PO'I STENG DU, ,RI RAB BANG RIM BZHI'I DBUS SU ZLUM GTOR CHE BA @010A *, ,MDA' DAD DAR BCAS PA BZHUG ,BAR RIM DANG PO LA GTOR CHUNG DU GU DMAR GTOR RNAMS BZHAG ,GNYIS PA LA BKRA SHIS RDZAS BRGYAD GSUM PA BZHI PA LA DAM RDZAS DAD 'THEB DKYU RNAMS BZHAG , ,,LAG TU ME LONG MDA' DAR BZUNG BAR BYA'O, ,MANGGA LAm, ,)
